story.book

Class OnlineStoryController

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.OnlineStoryController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StoryController

    public class OnlineStoryController
extends java.lang.Object
implements StoryController
    StoryController to read and download locally stored stories. This controller interfaces with the IO and ES clients.
    Author:
    Alexander Cheung

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private ESClient es 
      private IOClient io

      private void changeLocalSID(int oldSID, int newSID)
      Changes the SID of a locally stored Story to a new SID.
      private void checkSIDConflict(int SID)
      Checks if an SID already exists in a locally stored Story.
      void getStory(int SID)
      Sets the current application Story to the story with the specified SID using the ESClient.
      java.util.ArrayList<StoryInfo> getStoryList()
      Returns an ArrayList of StoryInfo from the server using the ESClient.
      void saveStory()
      Saves the current application Story to local storage after checking for and resolving SID conflicts.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OnlineStoryController

        public OnlineStoryController()

    • Method Detail

      • changeLocalSID

        private void changeLocalSID(int oldSID,
                            int newSID)
        Changes the SID of a locally stored Story to a new SID. The old Story is deleted from storage and replaced by the same Story but with a new SID.
        Parameters:
        oldSID - the SID of the Story to change
        newSID - the new SID the Story will be assigned

      • checkSIDConflict

        private void checkSIDConflict(int SID)
        Checks if an SID already exists in a locally stored Story. If there is a conflict, it is resolved by changing the SID of the locally stored Story to a new SID.
        Parameters:
        SID - the SID being checked for

      • getStory

        public void getStory(int SID)
        Sets the current application Story to the story with the specified SID using the ESClient.
        Specified by:
        getStory in interface StoryController
        Parameters:
        SID - the ID of the Story to load

      • getStoryList

        public java.util.ArrayList<StoryInfo> getStoryList()
        Returns an ArrayList of StoryInfo from the server using the ESClient.
        Specified by:
        getStoryList in interface StoryController
        Returns:
        the ArrayList of StoryInfo from the server

      • saveStory

        public void saveStory()
        Saves the current application Story to local storage after checking for and resolving SID conflicts.
        Specified by:
        saveStory in interface StoryController
